tool.name: GFF3 Add Gene to CDS for Sixpack
tool.description: Properly formats naive ORF caller output for Apollo
tool.help:
..class:: warningmark
This tool is incredibly naive. It does not think. It will remove each mRNA feature from the gff3 and leave all other features with the gene parent. This is used to fix the naive ORF caller Sixpack output for entering into Apollo via jBrowse.
